name: Runecasting 101
description:
A young wizard-in-training has to take his final for Runecasting 101, but due to a raging party the previous night he can only remember one glyph. Now he has to figure out a way to pass the final using only one the spell.

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 90, the theme was illusion and the limitation was there could only be one character, however one wants to interpret that.

This game's collision is fairly buggy. If you're having trouble pressing levers or making moving platform illusions, we're sorry! It should work if you give it a few tries.

Credits

CoByte - lead programmer
SmallBugGames - programmer, artist, sound designer

All sound effects and music from Freesound.com
